mapper.sql:
SELECT rgla_pk, rgla_crgo_pk, rgla_codigo, rgla_enti_pk, rgla_tipo
, rglv_pk, rglv_fini, rglv_ffin, rglv_orden , rglv_valor_base, rglv_condicion, rglv_formula, rglv_path_impuesto , rglv_path_pagador, rglv_path_es_suj_pasivo, rglv_path_cod_exen , rglv_path_info1, rglv_path_info2, rglv_path_info3, rglv_path_info4, rglv_path_info5, rglv_path_info6 , rglv_etiq_info1, rglv_etiq_info2, rglv_etiq_info3, rglv_etiq_info4, rglv_etiq_info5, rglv_etiq_info6 , rglv_path_cuant1, rglv_path_cuant2, rglv_path_cuant3, rglv_path_cuant4, rglv_path_cuant5, rglv_path_cuant6 , rglv_etiq_cuant1, rglv_etiq_cuant2, rglv_etiq_cuant3, rglv_etiq_cuant4, rglv_etiq_cuant5, rglv_etiq_cuant6
, ( SELECT crgo_codigo FROM tbl_cargo_crgo WHERE crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk ) AS crgo_codigo , ( SELECT enti_tipo FROM tbl_entidad_enti WHERE enti_pk = rgla_enti_pk ) AS enti_tipo
, #{fechaVigencia} AS rgla_fref FROM tbl_regla_rgla INNER JOIN tbl_regla_version_rglv ON rglv_rgla_pk = rgla_pk

where.if:
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_regla_inc_rgin WHERE rgin_rgla1_pk = rgla_pk
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_regla_inc_version_rgiv WHERE rgiv_rgin_pk = rgin_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN rgiv_fini AND COALESCE(rgiv_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) )
AND rgin_rgla2_pk = #{incompatibleId} )

AND rgla_crgo_pk = #{crgoId}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_cargo_version_crgv WHERE crgv_crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN crgv_fini AND COALESCE(crgv_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) )

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_aspecto_cargo_ascr WHERE ascr_aspc_pk = vlrc_aspc_pk AND ascr_crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk ) AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN rglv_fini AND COALESCE(rglv_ffin, vlrc_fref) AND vlrc_pk = #{vlrcId} )

mapper.select: ORDER BY rgla_crgo_pk, rgla_enti_pk, rgla_tipo, rglv_orden
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_regla_rgla INNER JOIN tbl_regla_version_rglv ON rglv_rgla_pk = rgla_pk

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_regla_rgla INNER JOIN tbl_regla_version_rglv ON rglv_rgla_pk = rgla_pk WHERE rgla_pk = #{id} AND ( #{version.fini} BETWEEN rglv_fini AND COALESCE(rglv_ffin, #{version.fini}) OR COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime()) BETWEEN rglv_fini AND COALESCE(rglv_ffin, COALESCE(#{version.ffin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, portico.getSysdateTime())) )
AND rglv_pk <> #{version.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_regla_rgla (rgla_pk, rgla_codigo, rgla_enti_pk, rgla_tipo, rgla_crgo_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{codigo}, #{enti.id}, #{tipo}, #{crgo.id})
